Text: Dear Sno, can you please upload the Spanish series 'Gran Hotel' aired that aired on ITV with English subs? Please :)

@SoupPlease - That will be arriving this coming weekend ;)
Thanks! I really enjoy all the non-English TV that you've shared.
So thrilled to know that you plan to upload the new Arne Dahl series -- your uploads are so very good, and much appreciated.

I have not been able to log in for well over a year but figured it out today - thank you so much Snowhiter from bringing us all such fine programs with English subs. It is a real joy- you are really the Best!
